translations: 在……上加商标；使显得独一无二（brand 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: Local companies find the sites and build the theme parks, while we will look after the branding.
sentences.translation: 本地公司选择场地及兴建主题公园，我们则负责品牌维护。

sentences.sentence: It is argued, stripping cartons of their branding will trigger no mass movement to quit.
sentences.translation: 有人认为，剥离纸盒上的品牌标识不会让大多数人戒烟。

sentences.sentence: Millennials, it seems, face the paradox of being the least formal generation yet the most conscious of style and personal branding.
sentences.translation: 千禧一代似乎面临着这样一个矛盾：一方面，他们代表着最无拘无束的一代，然而另一方面，他们却最注重风格和个人品牌。
